snippet: North Carolina's John Henson practiced Thursday despite his injured wrist, but still may not play in the No. 1 Tar Heels' N.C.A.A. tournament opener against Vermont on Friday.
abstract: North Carolina's John Henson practiced Thursday despite his injured wrist, but still may not play in the No. 1 Tar Heels' N.C.A.A. tournament opener against Vermont on Friday.

headline.main: Henson Still Questionable for Tar Heels' Tourney Opener
